segments.text: Do you take vitamin pills regularly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Maybe you should do it too . You may not get enough vitamins from your food , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , I don't believe in taking pills to get enough vitamins .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because it's better , easier and cheaper to get them from the food we eat .
segments.speaker: S2
